name: Virus 2 - Chapter One [Demo 1]
description:
Hello Everyone.... This Is The Demo For My Next Project "Virus 2".

Don't Worry, This Is Only A Demo For Chapter One. More Progress Will Be Made, And Maybe A Second Demo Released?

Sorry About The Ending, It Was Rushed :c

If You Have Not, Play Glitch, Malware And Virus To Understand Some Of The Story:

- Glitch [Glitch - The Prequel To Virus by DeeTDM, Ripnet]

- Malware [Malware - The Game by DeeTDM (itch.io)]

- Virus 1 [Mr. virus by Ripnet (itch.io)]

Huge Shoutout To Ripnet, The Original Creator Of This Series. Stay Around For More Content Soon :D
